column4: ï»¿ I'm having problems sharing a folder between a 8.04 machine and a 8.10 machine. I dont seem to be able to change the permission on the folder i want to share ( it's a fat32 partition). any suggestions?
strange, removing the share as root and adding it again as myself seem to work. I'll try again :)
try not to do it as root. if you just installed samba, then it needs to be rebooted
